title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Designing a Curriculum Based on Medical Professional Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze core job competencies of physicians and nurses in primary healthcare settings and design competency-based educational modules.
Learners can derive job tasks based on community health needs and develop assessable performance criteria.
Learners can design competency-based educational activities in blended learning environments and verify their applicability in real-world settings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
